creator: ce736@torfree.net
text:
Currently Zip task does not support zip archive comments.
It would be nice to have.

creator: larry.shatzer@mirotechnologies.com
text:
Created attachment 8861
Patch to implement zip comments in <zip> task

creator: peterreilly@apache.org
text:
Commented the patch.
This will be in the next release of ant (1.6.3/1.7.0).
Sorry for the delay.
